consume.name: Consume
consume.description: This service can be called to consume a specified or predefined number of pieces from a supply. It belongs to the Inventory Manager integration. Important: Only one of the fields `amount` and `predefined-amount` can be specified.

amount.name: Amount
amount.description: How many pieces should we consume?

predefined-amount.name: Predefined Amount
predefined-amount.description: Which pre-defined amount do we consume?
